author: Joi-Marie McKenzie
title: "The Martian" Opens Friday; "Sicario" Expands
text:
Share Article 
Aidan Monaghan/Twentieth Century Fox Film (LOS ANGELES) -- Here's a look at the movies that are new in theaters on Friday: The Martian -- Matt Damon is an astronaut stranded on Mars, and NASA and his crewmates attempt to rescue him. Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Pena, Kate Mara, Sean Bean, Sebastian Stan, Mackenzie Davis and Donald Glover star in the space drama, which is based on the best-selling novel of the same name. Rated PG-13. 
Expanding wide: Sicario -- Emily Blunt stars as an FBI agent who becomes involved in the war against drugs on the U.S.-Mexico border. Benicio Del Toro, Josh Brolin, Victor Garber and Jon Bernthal also star. Rated R.
